description:
The samurai and the Straw Hats shout for joy as they hear that Luffy defeated Kaido. Meanwhile, Momonosuke informs Zunesha of a major decision that he made. However, when Yamato calls on the Animal Kingdom Pirates to stop fighting, the earth trembles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Baisser de rideau. Vainqueur, Luffy au chapeau de paille !
Der Vorhang fällt! – Der Sieger heißt Strohhut Ruffy!
The Curtain Falls! The Winner, Straw Hat Luffy!
幕引き! 勝者 麦わらのルフィ!
